entry.title: DATA AVAILABILITY via @ethereum Data availability is the guarantee that the block proposer published all transaction data for a block and that the tra...
entry.summary: DATA AVAILABILITY via @ethereum Data availability is the guarantee that the block proposer published all transaction data for a block and that the transaction data is available to other network participants. https://ethereum.org/nb/developers/docs/data-availability/

entry.title: RT dhai.eth 🤠 📍 🇮🇳: So glad we're finally doing workshops in the DAO now! h/t to @ropats16 @kempsterrrr @grow_love and everyone else who's...
entry.summary: RT dhai.eth 🤠 📍 🇮🇳 So glad we're finally doing workshops in the DAO now! h/t to @ropats16 @kempsterrrr @grow_love and everyone else who's been working on this initiative Having workshops on a regular basis is huge for our education-related goals Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Building Decentralized Frontends and Deploying them to @ArweaveTeam presented by @dhaiwat10 on 4th August 2022 at 4:30 PM UTC in developers voice channel. Estimated duration of workshop: 60 - 90 mins ⚡️

entry.summary: RT pbillingsby Did you know that @ArweaveTeam has their own smart contracts? You can write these contracts in JS, C, Solidity & Rust. I’ll be posting more about them in the coming weeks, keep your eyes peeled! Until then you can read more about SmartWeave contracts here https://academy.warp.cc
